melee.description: Focus on close-quarters combat, boosting infantry attack.

breakthrough.description: Concentrated attack to breach defenses, boosting heavy unit attack.

skirmish.description: Hit-and-run tactics, increasing ranged unit speed and attack.

bombardment.description: Long-range assault to weaken enemy lines, boosting siege unit attack.

reconnaissance.description: Emphasis on scouting and flanking, boosting recon unit speed and defense.

flanking.description: Outmaneuver the enemy, boosting infantry and recon attack when combined.

siege.description: Wear down fortified positions, boosting siege and heavy unit attack, but reducing speed.

ambush.description: Surprise attack to catch the enemy off guard, boosting ranged unit attack and speed.
